sentences.english: The police are also urging him to have his daughter's body cremated quickly, he said.
sentences.chinese: 警察还极力敦促他尽快将女儿的遗体火化，陈广干说。

sentences.english: So the temple can't receive any dead bodies to cremate for almost two months now.
sentences.chinese: 所以寺庙近两个月来不能接受任何尸体火化。

sentences.english: Four new crematory are commissioned at the fu shan crematorium.
sentences.chinese: 富山火葬场四个新火化炉投入服务。

sentences.english: There are so many bodies that undertakers want to cremate them in groups.
sentences.chinese: 尸体太多了，以至于工作人员得将他们集体火化。

sentences.english: New cremators commissioned at the Fu Shan Crematorium.
sentences.chinese: 富山火葬场新火化炉投入服务。

sentences.english: Chinese cremate practically all their burials. Nothing is left "intact".
sentences.chinese: 中国人死后是要火化的，没有什么能完整地留下来。

sentences.english: Decommission the existing crematorium after the satisfactory commissioning of the new one.
sentences.chinese: 在新火化炉顺利运作后，拆卸现有的火葬场。

sentences.english: I waited for her cremains by the ashes furnace.
sentences.chinese: 骨灰出炉前我们和火化师父说好在炉前等。

sentences.english: The body was exhumed and burned .
sentences.chinese: 尸体从墓中掘出来再予以火化。

sentences.english: Planning is under way to minimise delays in burials and cremations.
sentences.chinese: 减少丧葬和火化延迟方面的计划将紧随其后。

sentences.english: He was cremated , and his ashes were scattered over the ocean, as he wished.
sentences.chinese: 他被火化了，骨灰撤海，如他生前所愿。

sentences.english: It was used as burial ground for monks of temple after cremation .
sentences.chinese: 是寺僧圆寂火化后灵骨的墓葬地。

sentences.english: The corpse of anyone who died from a quarantinable infectious disease must be cremated at a nearby place.
sentences.chinese: 因患检疫传染病而死亡的尸体，必须就近火化。

sentences.english: Immediately after the service, Einstein's remains were cremated.
sentences.chinese: 在哀悼仪式之后，爱因斯坦随即就被火化了。

sentences.english: After cremation, water is used to cool gases in the crematorium chimney.
sentences.chinese: 火化之后要用水来冷却火葬场烟囱中的气体。

sentences.english: This is where the dead are brought to be interred or cremated.
sentences.chinese: 这里就是那些死者被带来埋葬或者火化的地方。

definition: buried and at rest (idiom); Resquiescat in pacem (RIP)
to put dead body in coffin
to keep watch beside a coffin
